metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000071 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Jasig phpCAS version 1.3.4 is vulnerable to an authentication bypass in thevalidateCAS20 function when configured to authenticate against an old CASserver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-cas - 1.3.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php-cas package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-1').
